Articles.Content: Anyone ever try the Seperatron? I feel like it would just launch whatever I want "separated" into my craft. If used successfully let me know.
Use WASD to shift the way its pointing away from your craft
Well, the reason it does that, is because its facing upwards, so put it on your upper stage insted of bottem. HOWEVER: Use the QEASD keys to rotate it upsidown so that it fires away!
